CustomField.description: Used for Zenkraft Shipmate, based on "Sender Name" populates the corresponding Shipping Preferences.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Sender_Name__c, "Fulfillment Dept (Andwin)"), "ShipmatePreference-0001", IF(ISPICKVAL(Sender_Name__c, "Client Service Dept (NYC)"), "ShipmatePreference-0002", IF(ISPICKVAL(Sender_Name__c, "Client Service Dept (CA)"), "ShipmatePreference-0003", "")))
CustomField.label: FedEx Shipmate Preferences
